thread.title: Question for recent guests and management
thread.title_full: Question for recent guests and management - Review of The Kimberly Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: SunnyRita
title: Question for recent guests and management
text: We would love to stay at the Kimberly. However, we have been advised by the hotel that we could be woken from 6.30 am in the morning because of the noise from the construction taking place opposite the hotel. Can anyone tell me how bad this is and how much it would affect our stay.
